name: Hero Bond
description:
So many games where you shoot to move... how about one where you move to shoot?

But that's not all! You have to juggle controlling two different characters - with entirely different control schemes - at the same time! In addition, the Jumper ki-blasting martial artist can only kill blue spiders... while the cyborg Gunner can only shoot red wasps! Ikaruga meets Knuckles Chaotix meets Star Fox Zero... wait... only one of these games was good... :P

Well I hope I did it better, lol.

All music is royalty free so dw about streaming.
